title: Metrics
description: This is map of metrics and measures. Each key is the valid URI of a known `Metric`. Each value is a `Measure`, i.e. a concrete data point.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/di.description: Asynchronous message(s) that have been returned as temporarily undeliverable the receiving system.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/ap.description: Triggered when the application does not exit gracefully. Event is sent on application launch after a crash.
Activation(s) of an application feature that is being measured.
Install of an application on a device. Triggered on first launch after install.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/ad.description: Impression(s) of an advertisement to an end user with the potential of being viewed.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/we.description: Click of a web-link has occurred.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/ap.description: Launch of an application. Triggered on every run, including crashes and installs. Also triggered on a resume from background when the lifecycle session timeout has been exceeded.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/di.description: Click on a link in a message to a web hosted mirror page.
Asynchronous message(s) failed to deliver in a way that indicates that no future delivery attempts will be successful to the address.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/we.description: View(s) of a webpage has occurred.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/co.description: Initializations of a new product-list. Example a shopping cart is created.
Removal(s) of a product entry from a product-list. Example a product is removed from a shopping cart.
A product-list that was no longer accessible(abandoned) has been re-activated by the user. Example via a re-marketing activity.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/di.description: Asynchronous message(s) (email, SMS, MMS etc) have been dispatched to a person's account/address/device.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/ap.description: Upgrade of an application that has previously been installed. Triggered on first launch after upgrade.

https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metrics/di.description: User complaint(s) have been received. This generally occurs when a recipient of a message reports it as spam.
The direct marketing message (email, SMS, Push Notifications etc) has been opened/swyped/touched by the recipient.
The recipient of the direct marketing message (email, newsletters, etc) has opted out from receiving them.
Asynchronous message (email, SMS, MMS etc) was not dispatched due to cancellation or expiration of the marketing activity.
